name: Racing Combat
summary: Racing Combat is super fun multiplayer racing battle game. Are you a hero racing fighter for your top position? than let's clash with real opponents worldwide or with your friends. Win races to discover new awesome cars & power cards. Upgrade your power drivers to defeat other traffic rider in real-time. Form Gadgets to Weapons to Spells, Racing Combat has dozens of cards to load in your combat deck. Win Trophies and Chests to lead your path to victories!
